name: IEEE Students Net
short_description:
IEEE STUDENT NET is your best way to be always in touch with IEEE, the institute and members, the application is going to introduce the IEEE Region8 to you as a non-member and it will help you to become a new and active IEEE member, since we will excrete events, activities and contests of the institute in region8 and the current branch to you, all in one mobile application.
For those who are already IEEE members, with IEEE STUDENT NET it will be easier for you to access events and competitions, also view descriptions and rules. You can also form your team and start participating into events and competitions.
For administrators they will have the ability of organizing their own events and competitions. 
The application is made for any IEEE member or non-members that have interests in Engineering, Science & Technology.
summary: Android application to keep IEEE R8 Students members in touch.
